item.description:
So, it's going to be 78 on Sat and 82 on Sunday, what better way to enjoy the weather than a walk on the beach!

If you walk the entire length of the beach and back to the T it's 8.0 miles. We'll walk as much as the group wants to. Don't forget your sunscreen!

Here's a google map of the 8.0 miles.

I'll be taking the T (Blue Line to Wonderland), but there's parking all around the beach. Let's meet across the street (beach side) from the police station, which if you're taking the T is a straight line from the T to the beach. Here's a pic.

There are a couple places around for food too, if people are interested. Kelly's Roast Beef is nearby as an option.
item.how_to_find_us: Call/text my cell (you'll get it in email before the event)
item.name: Revere Beach - Blue Line (Wonderland Stop)
